events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and the shipment still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't been updated in several days, and I'm worried about the delay.
The issue has been identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's description about late shipment and stale tracking updates.
A customer support agent has been assigned to assist with the delayed delivery issue as reported by the customer.
Hello, I’m here to help you with the delay in your order delivery. I understand how frustrating this can be, and I’ll do my best to resolve this.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have so I can check the current status with the courier?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and here is the tracking code: ZX987654321. The status hasn't changed since last week, it still says "In transit".

I have contacted the shipping company on your behalf and escalated your tracking. They expect a delivery delay due to unforeseen transit issues, but your package should arrive within the next three business days.
Thank you for the update. I appreciate you following up with the courier. I'll wait the next three days and hope it arrives soon.
Your package has now been delivered successfully. Please confirm if you have received it so we can close this case.
Yes, I just received the package. Everything is in perfect condition now. Thank you very much for your assistance.
Checking in to ensure that everything with your recent delivery is satisfactory and to offer any further assistance if needed.
Since you confirmed receipt and no further issues have been reported, we are closing this delivery delay case. Thank you for your patience.
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey to help us improve our service in the future.
